intro_questions.text: Can you spell your family name, please?

main_questions.text: What do you do to stay healthy?
What do you like to eat?
What do you like to do in the evening?
Where do you go to school?

respond_situations.starter_line: Where do you want to go?
respond_situations.description: You are at a bus stop.

respond_situations.starter_line: What do you want to drink?
respond_situations.description: The examiner is at a café with the candidate.
The examiner is in a clothing shop with the candidate.

ask_situations.instruction: You are shopping. Ask the shopkeeper for the price of an item.
You are at school. Ask your friend for help with homework.
You are at a café with a friend. You want to order food. ..

listening_script.text: I like drawing and painting. I draw with a pencil. I paint with colors. My favorite color is blue. I draw animals and flowers.

follow_up_questions.question: What do you wear in winter?
Where do you buy your winter clothes?
How do you feel in your winter clothes?
Why do you like your winter coat?
